s.text: I just finished a stained glass window that I've been working on for four years ...

Whether castigating them on the silver screen, between the lines of pulpy, true-crime narratives, or in the jokes told around the proverbial water cooler, attorneys have been on the receiving end of many a hackneyed punch line.
Schwartz said her job keeps her involved in the community -- and allows her to sleep with a sound conscience.
"I guess I've sold a few things," Schwartz said, but "mostly I just make things for myself. "
I just sort of call it my peace studies program -- any author that I think has ideas (as to) how people can live together without killing each other, that's what I like to read."
I just sort of call it my peace studies program -- any author that I think has ideas (as to) how people can live together without killing each other, that's what I like to read."
Asked how she and her husband manage to juggle so many competing demands upon their time, Schwartz replied, "we don't watch TV."
